1.0.name: wordpress/q-sensei-widgets
1.0.description:
About the Plugin

This Plugin allows you to quickly and easily include the useful features of the Q-Sensei Search Engine directly into your blog.

Q-Sensei - Your Guide through the World's Information

Q-Sensei introduces a new way of making information accessible. Its goal is to provide advanced search tools for the vast amount of information available nowadays on the Internet, in books, research articles, blogs, news, or wikis. They currently provide access to the first several million scholarly articles. Q-Sensei's approach applies innovative search technologies to various heterogeneous data pools; their users can easily browse through a data source as well as discover cross-references between individual records.

Try out Q-Sensei!
